text:
After finishing the grand adventure to save the "Endangered World",
and a while after witnessing the reunion of Barte and her master, it's a weekday morning.
[Player] had been called by a certain individual and was at Central Square in Orient City.

As they waited in front of the landmark Hero statue,
the person they were meeting ran towards them.

name: Barte
text:
Heeeey, [Player]!
Sorry to keep you waiting!

options.text: Barte!
You really came to Earth!

name: Barte
text:
Sorry for calling you on a workday!
There aren't many flights back to Garunderra,
so this is the only time available...!

name: Barte
text:
The paperwork for joining this 'Hero Agency' thing took longer than I thought.
It took me a whole day yesterday.

options.text: So you joined an agency!
Which one did you join?

name: Barte
text:
Yeah. At first, I thought I'd just go with the same place as Ganran,
but after looking around, I found a place that seemed more suitable for me...

name: Barte
text:
I decided to put myself in the care of a place called Creative Brain!
Their headquarters are on Earth, which is why I came all the way here.

options.text: Oh, Creative Brain!
That's where writers and designers are!
You're an artist at heart, Barte.

name: Barte
text: Yup! I became a Hero because I wanted to forge beautiful blades!

name: Barte
text:
I heard that being a Hero is licensed in this world,
and I was a little worried, but I'm glad I passed the exam safely!

name: Barte
text: Now I can proudly do Hero activities here while also continuing my blacksmith training!

name: Barte
text:
...Whoops. Time's running out.
Let's stop with the small talk...
Saying that, Barte lowered the bag she was carrying on her back and started rummaging inside.

name: Barte
text:
There was something I really wanted to give you in person.
...Here!

With that, Barte handed over a carefully wrapped small box.
It was tied with a very beautiful ribbon, shining with iridescent colors.

options.text: Huh, what a stylish present.
I didn't know you were good at this kind of thing.
Even the wrapping is cute...

name: Barte
text:
Th-This wrapping... well.
A senior I met yesterday in the agency taught me how to do it.

name: Barte
text:
"If it's a present, wrap it properly!" they said, and made me redo it...
But never mind that.

name: Barte
text:
Just open it already!
I put a lot of effort into it!

Prompted by Barte, [Player] unwrapped the gift and
opened the lid of the pretty wooden box inside.
Then...

options.text: Is this an accessory...!?
It's a bracelet!
It has all sorts of decorations!

text: It was a bracelet with several metal ornaments and gems connected by a leather strap.
An axe, a cutlass, a magic staff, a guitar; 4 ornaments, strung together like beads.

Each of the decoration was intricately designed to
resemble the Parallel Weapons of the Heroes on your journey.

options.text: Amazing... it's beautiful.
So you could make something like this, too.

name: Barte
text: ...I usually only forge blades, so I don't really make these delicate things.

name: Barte
text: But, I really wanted to thank you in my own way.

name: Barte
text:
Because at that time... you offered to accompany me to the Guild.
Because you connected the portal for usâ€”

name: Barte
text:
I was able to return to this world.
And I was able to... reunite with Ganran.

name: Barte
text:
It was a tough journey, but thanks to you and the members, we were able to overcome it.
I made this while remembering that.

name: Barte
text:
I thanked the others too, but...
I wanted to give this to you, specifically,
because you were the Hero who connected us all together.

name: Barte
text:
So... please accept it if you like.
No amount of gratitude will ever be enough,
but I wanted to give you something tangible as a token.

options.text: Thank you, I'll cherish it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey!
"Thank you" is my line!
You don't get to say that!

options.text: You could be an accessory craftsman!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no!
I'm aiming to be a bladesmith,
and that's very far from my specialty!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But... that means you thought it was beautiful, right?
Ehehe, I'm happy.

options.text: Now I can always remember that journey.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heheh, right?
I thought it was a good idea myself!

options.text: This accessory, could you put it on me?
On this arm, if you could.
You wanted to see if it's my size, right?

name: Barte
text:
Eh... Eh!?
M-Me, put it on you!?
Are you serious!?

name: Barte
text:
W-Well, still...
I do need to see if the size is right, after all.
Alright then... please pardon me for a moment.
Barte unfastened the bracelet and tried to put it on [Player]'s outstretched arm.
For some reason, her hand seemed to be trembling.

options.text: Huh, are you nervous?
Are you alright?

name: Barte
text:
O-Of course I'm alright!
Don't underestimate me, I can do it...!
...How's this!?
By Barte's hand, the bracelet was fastened onto [Player]'s arm.

It fit perfectly, as if custom-made...
and surprisingly, it suited their usual suit attire.

options.text: Wow, it's a perfect fit!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ohh, I did it!
Looks like no adjustments will be needed for this!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Yeah, just as I thought.
It really suits you.
I'm relieved.

options.text: How does it look on me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, it suits you.
Just as I thought.
...Mhm.

options.text: You have a good sense of design!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so...?
But it definitely suits you.
Mhm...

text: Seeing [Player] wearing her handmade accessory, Barte smiled contentedly.
Her expression also looked a little shy.
-Just then, the alarm on Barte's mobile device rang.

name: Barte
text:
Whoa... this is bad!
If I don't get on that train soon,
I'll miss my return flight!

name: Barte
text:
Well then...
See ya, [Player]!
Take good care of that, okay!?

Barte ran off towards the station.
However, she stopped midway and looked back.

name: Barte
text:
â€”Come visit Garunderra again, too!!
And...

name: Barte
text:
If you ever need my strength, just give me a call!!
Wherever you may be, I'll rush over to help!

options.text: Yeah, I'll definitely visit!
Be sure to get along with your master!
Hurry, get going!

text: Barte, beaming at [Player]'s voice, waved her hand as she went on her way.
After Barte left, [Player] raised the accessory on their arm to the sky.

The light, reflected by the gems, hit the ornament
and shimmered perfectly in rainbow colors.

options.text: ...Alright, I'll do my best today too!
With this, I can see you anytime, Barte.
I want to go on a journey with everyone again.
